---
title: "School to School Comparison of Deployment Measures"
output: word_document
params:
  t2_measures: NA
  t2_matched: NA
  t2_selected: NA
---
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=6.5}

#loop through each deployment measure
for (i in params$t2_measures){
cat('\n')  
cat("#",i, "\n")
print(
ggplot(data = rbind(params$t2_matched, params$t2_selected)) +
      geom_bar(mapping = aes(
        x = reorder(ID, get(i)),
        y = get(i),
        fill = color), 
        stat = "identity") + 
      scale_fill_manual(values = c("#9fb9c8","#104f75")) +
      guides(fill = FALSE) +
      coord_flip() + 
      xlab("School") + 
      ylab(i) + 
      theme_bw()
)
cat('\n') 
}
